topics.body:
And now I've learned one of the most annoying things when drinking alcohol: sober light weights that think they're hot shit.  I'm moderately drunk after drinking half a bottle of tequila and the person in question can't even drink a six pack of light bear without going to the hospital and yet I'm getting recorded on the phone making french fries.

What is their facebook post supposed to be? "dohohoho look at this person after drinking half a bottle of tequila making french fries while walking fine and doing the sobriety test by walking on a straight line and doing so within reason?  Look at how well they handle their alcohol and laugh"
